metadata.title: Crying

xml.lyrics:
I#146;m crying
Yes, I#146;m crying
And I just don#146;t know
How it#146;s all going to end
I#146;m thinking back a long time
When I hit my woman down
It was a bad bad evil night
When I realized what I#146;d done
It was way too late, too late
Too late for words and I#146;m crying

We hurt each other so bad
Nobody to turn to, no going back
No such thing as God for us
No more to touch her body

All I can do is break down in tears
I#146;m crying and wondering
Where am I now because of what I did
I just don#146;t know and I#146;m crying
It was a long time ago
The pain is over now

I was crying
